author: jonl
msg: Renamed AbstractValidator.getStringValue to getInput() since that's what everyone's calling it

author: jonl
msg: Refactored and simplified form validation.  Added CustomValidator and removed a lot of unnecessary code and complexity.

author: jonl
msg: When core calls onClick() it automatically causes redirection to prevent repeating of the action on browser refreshes.
Because we kept the onLinkClicked () interface method separate from the onClick() method, I was able to fix this bug like this:
// Since the invocation of onLinkClicked occurred through a URL that
// would repeat the action if the user refreshed the page, we redirect
// to our resulting page so this won't happen.

author: jonl
msg: Refactored feedback messages code and added a Form parameter to IValidationFeedback which is used by FeedbackPanel to restrict its output to just the Form being validated.  This effectively gives us per-form feedback panels again.
